price: Jecha yoo ol fuutes, dhugumatti Inni (Rabbiin) iccitiifi waan isa caalaa dhokates ni beeka.
arabic: وَإِن تَجۡهَرۡ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخۡفَى

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tajhar bil-qawli fa-innahu yaʿlamu al-sira wa-akhfā
